1: <pb/><t>Re' hin kow i nupahqaaj i rotob'il i QaJaaw Dios.</t> <t>Eh kow i nupahqaaj reh chi naa ruketelaam nuwach.</t>
2: <t>Eh xa reh wo' reh i nuq'or taqe i ti' k'axik inchalik chi nunaah.</t> <t>Reh wo' reh i nuq'or taqe i ruti'kiil nuk'ux.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Eh noq xiik' naah ti'kiil i w√°nima,</t> <t>re' hat Jaaw aweht'al inuk'achariik.</t> <t>Eh xa aha' ta chik ma' nkikoj i xirob'</t> <t>panub'eeh reh chi naa kianam weh.</t>
4: <t>Eh noq kintz'ehtanik</t> <t>reje panusak'aaj</t> <t>ma' awach taj ink'u'loq chi nutoob'jiik.</t> <t>Ma' awach ta wo' ink'ulik ko'linoq weh.</t>
5: <pb/><t>QaJaaw Dios, re' hin i nupahqaaj aawotob'il,</t> <t>je' wili i nuq'or: Re' hat ti ko'linik weh,</t> <t>xa re' wo' hat wilkaat chinaah i nuk'achariik ayu', kinki.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Jaaw, chayeew tii weh i nupahqaaj aweh,</t> <t>ruum q'e' ti' nuk'ux.</t> <t>Kinako'leej pan kiq'ab' i ki-ixowanik nuwach,</t> <t>ruum re' keh q'e' taqe kow kiib' chi nuwach i hin.</t>
7: <t>Re' hin je' naa pantz'ilom wilkiin.</t> <t>Kinako'leej tii reh chi nee tinuloq'ej,</t> <t>eh re' taqe i korik wach kik'ux naa rusuuqb'iik kik'ux wuuk'</t> <t>noq naakib'iram chi xinako'leej.</t>
